description: a(n)=number of Gaussian integers z=a+bi satisfying |z|<=n, b>=0.
comments: Number of ordered pairs of integers (x,y) with x^2 + y^2 <= n^2 and y >= 0. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 23 2012]
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for Gaussian integers and primes
prog: (Haskell)a036695 n = length [(x,y) | x <- [-n..n], y <- [0..n], x^2 + y^2 <= n^2]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 23 2012
author: _Clark Kimberling_
